info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.ai_data.bfdp
info.description: Custom handler in BFDP microservice will forward request(s) to Shape backend API(s)

post.description: Enable service by returning service account details

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

bfdpEnableFeatureRequest.description: Any payload to be passed on the Get Provision API
bfdpEnableFeatureRequest.title: EnableFeatureRequest

bfdpEnableFeatureResponse.description: Any payload to be passed on the Get Provision API
bfdpEnableFeatureResponse.title: EnableFeatureResponse

bfdpRefreshTokenRequest.description: API to refresh token for a given pipeline
bfdpRefreshTokenRequest.title: RefreshTokenRequest

product_name.description:
product_name is a pipeline name for which token to be generated

Example: ` "product_name"`
product_name.title: product_name

result.description:
Result will be in json format having token in it. 

Example: ` "result"`
result.title: result
